source.query: SELECT TerritoryID as territory_id , Name as name , CountryRegionCode as country_region_code , salesterritory.Group as sales_group , SalesYTD as sales_ytd , SalesLastYear as sales_last_year , CostYTD as cost_ytd , CostLastYear as cost_last_year , cast(ModifiedDate as char) as modified_date FROM salesterritory Where ModifiedDate > '${last_modified_date}'
